select ctgr_nm, subj_nm, subj_regdate, subj_startdate, subj_enddate from category a, subject b where a.ctgr_code = b.ctgr_code
and subj_enddate >= to_char(sysdate,'yy/mm/dd')
and subj_enddate < to_char(sysdate,'yy/mm/dd')
and rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}) where rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}
order by subj_enddate desc
